Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: T. von Drehle
Reviews.Content: I had bought this camera for myself and loved it so much that I bought my son one too.  He can take pictures from Montana and email  them to me in North Carolina via WlFi. He doesn't have to wait to hook the camera up to the computer!  The 18x optical zoom comes in handy at my children's soccer games.  I can't say enough good things about this camera!

Reviews.Title: First 2 models were lousy; 3rd is great
Reviews.Author: Teetoncey
Reviews.Content: One lesson: make sure you get a New-in-Box model.  The first 2 I got were from a local, uh, discount store, and were probably, well, not New-in-Box....  The one that works is great.  Easy to learn, easy to use, great pix, 18x zoom, all kinds of neat features.  Cute, small, fair battery life (you can buy back-up battery and charger for <$7).  Best camera I've ever had (so far).

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Sara Begue
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the camera. It takes great pictures and it has a decent zoom feature. It uploads pictures quickly to the Internet, which is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Great, powerful little camera
Reviews.Author: Gerald H. Cook
Reviews.Content: The powerful zoom and special features on this pocket size camera are amazing. I especially like the wi-fi feature that allow you to directly email photos to a friend or yourself for later printing or distribution.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: R. Thomas
Reviews.Content: The camera works great and I am glad I purchased it. I will buy again online in the future. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: samsun
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Batchelor
Reviews.Content: Everything I was looking for.  Great product and great price.  Samsung a great support site and learning center.  easy instructions

Reviews.Title: Lots of good things, sometimes have to retake indoor pics- more often than you should
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn Winter
Reviews.Content: Occasionally, it doesn't focus the picture well indoors. Outdoors is great. Indoors, I sometimes have to retake indoor pics even if being very careful to stay still while shooting the pic. And there is no specific setting for indoors, but it has lots of bells and whistles that work great! Great video quality.

Reviews.Title: The BEST camera I have ever had
Reviews.Author: Leslie Howell
Reviews.Content: I am no expert photographer, but this camera is wonderful. I have had it for 4 months and love the quality of pictures I get from it.  I even figured out the e-mail function on it.  Easy to use and a beautiful picture.

Reviews.Title: camera is great, accessories are not!
Reviews.Author: kathy bullis
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, however I was attracted to this vendor because of the added accessories. The camera case is too small and has vivatar on the front although I purchased a Samsung. I could live with the incorrect logo if the camera would fit in the case. the package containing the lens cleaner, camera stand, sd card case etc.. was full of moldy soggy items because the cleaner fluid had leaked. Very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: camera samsung
Reviews.Author: Beverly C. Price
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, i am just learning to use it but the reason i purchased was for a concert I attended. My pictures turned out quite good considering how far away I was sitting. Also very easy to charge battery( unlike old camera). A good buy too in the kit I received much more than I expected!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!!
Reviews.Author: Quwna
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera, has a lot of features!!! and so much to offer and it's fairly priced. Very nicely packaged as well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung WB150 14.2MP
Reviews.Author: Carlos Sanchez
Reviews.Content: not much to say, each product meets the needs of those who buy and I think this camera is very good in all its functions.

Reviews.Title: bought for friend
Reviews.Author: slipps
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend. They like it very well. Now I want one for myself. I would give it a five but I haven't tried it personally yet.

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto y fácil de usar
Reviews.Author: Milena Gómez
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto y fácil de usar, con buena calidad y cumple con lo requerido, para quien se este iniciando en la fotografia

ProductInfo.Features:
Get the Best Shots, from Far Away or Up Close with an 18x Optical Zoom
Share your Best Photos Instantly with Family and Friends With Built-in Wi-Fi
Experience Intuitive Photo Editing Software, Right from the Camera
Easily Transfer Photos Wirelessly to Your PC, Smartphone, or Microsoft SkyDrive
14MP CCD Sensor Delivers Brighter and Clearer Images
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB150F 14.2MP WI-Fi Digital Camera in Black + 8GB Accessory Kit
